title: Veda AI
desc: Empowering educational institutions with cutting-edge GenAI solutions. Built a suite of AI-powered tools for students, teachers, and schools, including AI psychometric reports, AI quizzer, 24/7 AI tutor, and more. Led backend and AI development.

title: GetItWrite
desc: Contributed to ML and backend, enabling users to mimic famous authorsâ€™ writing styles. Developed AI models for text generation and style transfer.

title: DocSense
desc: AI-powered smart PDF comparison and analysis tool. Built interactive PDF querying using a locally deployed LLAMA3 8B LLM model, vectorization, and real-time chatbot functionality.

title: Watch the Drop [WTD]
desc: Led to 3rd place in the 24-hour hackathon at IIT Jodhpur, our team developed a full-stack application for product tracking and price analysis across multiple e-commerce platforms. Built an RNN model for price prediction, integrated a chatbot for real-time product recommendations, and conducted web scraping from major sites like Amazon and Flipkart.

title: AgroSync
desc: Contributed to ML and backend for an AI-driven agricultural insights platform. Connected farmers and consumers, included chat, chatbot, and crop grading ML.
